pages.text: $(c)$(l)Impetus Sword$() is the byproduct of $(l:relic_category/magic_condenser)condensing$() $(c)$(l)Impetus Essence$() into a $(l)Netherite Sword$(). Whenever you hit a target using this sword, you'll add $(c)charge$() to it.$(br)When fully charged, $(c)$(l)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use)$() to invoke a few fireballs in a radius. The closer your targets are, the more efficient the charged attack is.
